entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022
